# simpleweather

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

simpleweather is an R package that simply retrieves weather data for a vector of dates:

```{r example}
library(simpleweather)
dates <- seq(Sys.Date()-10, Sys.Date()+5, by = 'day')
get_weather(dates)
```

Currently only works for Central Park, NY. Location argument coming soon.

## Installation

You can install the development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("joemarlo/simpleweather")
```
